name: SSF14
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 14
subtitle: Needle Core Biopsy Findings
notes:
**Note 1**:  Record the findings of needle core biopsy as documented in the medical record.

**Note 2**:  If multiple needle core biopsy procedures are performed during the initial diagnostic workup, record the most extensive findings from all biopsy procedures.  Code 050 takes precedence over codes 010, 020, and 030.
rows: Positive needle core biopsy findings in one lobe/side
Positive needle core biopsy findings in both lobes/sides
Positive needle core biopsy findings, location (lobes/sides) not stated
Positive needle core biopsy findings beyond prostate

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 988 may result in an edit error.)

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
